mmSortable

restrict: 'C'

NameTypeDesciption
mmSortable Class no parameters
itemssource object itemsource for selection Modal
orderfield Column name to Order
Choosing an element to move them will be next target
Move From Arrow
High - {{item.order}} Low - {{item.order}} {{item.order}}
{{item.title}} {{item.due}} 
<div class="panel-body mmSortable" itemssource="tasks" orderfield="order" handle=".fa-arrows-v" >
  <div ng-repeat=" item in tasks" class="task" ng-class="{completed:item.completed}">
    <span ng-show="item.priority=='high'" class="label label-warning pull-right">High</span><span ng-show="item.priority=='low'" class="label pull-right">Low</span>
    <div class="fa fa-arrows-v task-sort-icon"></div>
    <div class="action-checkbox">
      <label class="px-single"><input type="checkbox" ng-model="item.completed" name="" value="" class="px"><span class="lbl"></span></label>
    </div>
    <a class="task-title">{{item.title}} {{item.order}}<span>{{item.due}}</span></a>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="panel-body mmSortable" itemssource="tasks" >
  <div ng-repeat=" item in tasks" class="task" ng-class="{completed:item.completed}">
    <span ng-show="item.priority=='high'" class="label label-warning pull-right">High</span><span ng-show="item.priority=='low'" class="label pull-right">Low</span>
    <div class="fa fa-arrows-v task-sort-icon"></div>
    <div class="action-checkbox">
      <label class="px-single"><input type="checkbox" ng-model="item.completed" name="" value="" class="px"><span class="lbl"></span></label>
    </div>
    <a class="task-title">{{item.title}} {{item.order}}<span>{{item.due}}</span></a>
  </div>
</div>
